about.title:
Why Choose
LA VACANZA BIANCA
about.subtitle:
We live in Italy and help organize ski holidays ‚Äî
professionally and with quality.

experience.title: Experience
experience.desc: We know every slope and select trails for your skiing level.

individual.title: Individual
individual.desc: No templates ‚Äî only a personal route for you.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.desc: Comfortable transfer and personal airport meetings

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.desc: We care about details so you can enjoy your vacation

text:
Being passionate fans of sports like skiing, climbing, hiking and kayaking,
after a short deliberation we chose ‚Äî believe it or not ‚Äî Italy!

We have traveled a lot, especially with skis.
The Alps attract so much that one trip becomes the start of a tradition.

The Alps mean mountains inspire, service takes care,
we fully accompany you, and you simply enjoy.
With us, vacation is that very Vacation you dream about.
about.whyUsText1: We decided that making La Vacanza Bianca for our clients that wonderful time when you don't have to worry about anything except the very fact of arriving in Italy ‚Äì that's a great idea.

whyUsList.item1: We will meet you right at the arrival area of Milan or Bergamo airport at any time
whyUsList.item2: We will take you to the hotel
whyUsList.item3: We will drive you from the hotel to the nearest parking near the lifts. And back
whyUsList.item4: We will help you choose and rent equipment and buy ski passes
whyUsList.item5: Together we will discuss and choose the slopes for the current day
whyUsList.item6: We will get on the lift with you and be with you all day so you don't worry about anything
whyUsList.item7: On the rest day, we will take you shopping, for a city walk, or to a hiking trail
whyUsList.item8: We will deliver you safe, sound, and happy to the airport

resorts.title: Best Ski Resorts in Italy
resorts.subtitle: We work at the most prestigious Alpine resorts

pianiDiBobbio.name: Piani di Bobbio
pianiDiBobbio.description: Special 25% discount! Perfect resort for those who want to ski near Milan. Modern lifts, 40+ km of trails for all levels, and traditional Italian atmosphere. Great choice for first-time Alpine experience.

madesimo.name: Madesimo
madesimo.description: Picturesque Valchiavenna valley with steep slopes and 60+ km of trails. Ideal for experienced skiers seeking a challenge. Elevation up to 2900 m guarantees excellent snow all season.

bivio.name: Bivio
bivio.description: Cozy Swiss village at Julier Pass at 1769 m elevation. Ideal for families: peaceful atmosphere, varied trails for all levels, and direct access to lifts right from the hotel. Great choice for those seeking comfortable skiing without the hustle of large resorts.
highlights: Ski school for children from 3 years

sanktMoritz.name: Sankt Moritz
sanktMoritz.description: Legendary Swiss resort - birthplace of winter tourism. 350+ km of trails at elevations up to 3300 m, luxury hotels and restaurants. For those who value prestige and elegance.

valmalenco.name: Valmalenco
valmalenco.description: Authentic Italian valley without tourist crowds. 40+ km of trails from 1200 to 2700 m, excellent freeride conditions. Ideal for those seeking to get a true Italian experience away from popular routes.

aprica.name: Aprica
aprica.description: Cozy family resort at 1180‚Äì2300 m elevation. 50+ km of trails perfect for beginners and intermediate skiers. Excellent infrastructure, children's schools, and peaceful atmosphere make it ideal for first-time alpine skiing experience.

livigno.name: Livigno
livigno.description: Farthest resort (200+ km from Milan), but one of Italy's highest-altitude resorts (1816‚Äì2900 m). 115 km of trails, duty-free zone, and affordable prices. Long skiing season thanks to elevation. Great choice for those not afraid of a long drive.

steps.title: How Your Journey Goes
steps.subtitle: We take care of all organizational details

step1.title: Introduction
step1.desc: We discuss your wishes, skiing level and format of your ideal vacation

step2.title: Tour Selection
step2.desc: We offer options that really suit you ‚Äî without templates

step3.title: Planning
step3.desc: Together with you we coordinate accommodation, transfers and key trip details

step4.title: Preparation
step4.desc: We form a detailed travel program and give all necessary recommendations

step5.title: Your Vacation
step5.desc: We accompany you on the slopes: you enjoy the mountains and vacation, and we stay with you at every turn

instructor.title: Your Guide and Organizer
instructor.description: My name is Dmitry. I am a ski guide and founder of La Vacanza Bianca. My goal is to show you the real Alps, their beauty and uniqueness, help you feel confident in skiing and organize a journey that you will remember only with warmth.

reviews.title: Reviews from Our Guests
reviews.subtitle: Stories from those who have already discovered the Alps with us
reviews.videoCaption: Elena's story about a ski weekend in Piani di Bobbio

review1.name: Vardan
review1.text: "St. Moritz is a very high level. Thank you for the excellent hotel and route selection! The skiing was magnificent, the slopes were perfectly prepared. The organization was top-notch, no issues."

review2.name: Ksenia
review2.text: "We've been to Italy before, skied at many popular resorts. This time we decided to go to Valmalenco with the guys from La Vacanza Bianca. It was really great. Few people, beautiful slopes, infrastructure, views - everything was super, thanks!"

review3.name: Olga
review3.text: "Thank you so much for the wonderful ski weekend! We hesitated for a long time to go to the mountains, always no time and unclear where to go, how to organize everything. We saw an ad for La Vacanza Bianca on Instagram and decided to write. In the end, it was a real, sporty, beautiful, unforgettable vacation! With Tatyana we selected the route and hotel. Dmitry met us in Como and was our guide for both days. Very caring, calm, professional. We just had to ski and enjoy!"

individual.title: Individual Approach
individual.text:
We don't work with templates.
Each trip is created for your skiing level,
vacation style and pace of life.
individual.note: That's why our clients come back and recommend us.

footer.description: Premium ski tours in Italy with personalized guidance.

newYear.title: New Year Discount!
newYear.description: Book services before mid-December and get a special discount on all programs!
